    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet Taxes_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Taxes_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Taxes xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <Total currencyCode="USD" minorUnit="2">80000</Total>
    <Tax sequenceNbr="Example String Value" taxExcludedInd="true">
        <AmountSummary description="Example String Value" percentage="10" quantity="1234" unitName="Example String Value" unitPrice="100.0000">
            <Total currencyCode="USD" minorUnit="2">80000</Total>
            <ChargeUnit>Per unit</ChargeUnit>
        </AmountSummary>
        <EffectiveExpire effective="2011-01-24" expire="2011-07-04" expireDateExclusiveInd="true"/>
        <TaxType_Enum>Assessment/license tax</TaxType_Enum>
    </Tax>
</Taxes>

      Example JSON

      {
  "Taxes" : {
    "Total" : {
      "value" : 80000,
      "currencyCode" : "USD",
      "minorUnit" : 2
    },
    "Tax" : [ {
      "@type" : "Tax",
      "sequenceNbr" : "Example String Value",
      "taxExcludedInd" : true,
      "AmountSummary" : {
        "unitPrice" : 100.0000,
        "unitName" : "Example String Value",
        "quantity" : 1234,
        "percentage" : 10,
        "description" : "Example String Value",
        "Total" : {
          "value" : 80000,
          "currencyCode" : "USD",
          "minorUnit" : 2
        },
        "ChargeUnit" : {
          "value" : "Per unit"
        }
      },
      "EffectiveExpire" : {
        "value" : null,
        "effective" : "2011-01-24",
        "expire" : "2011-07-04",
        "expireDateExclusiveInd" : true
      },
      "TaxType_Enum" : {
        "value" : "Assessment/license tax"
      }
    } ]
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Total
        Used to provide a total of all the taxes.
        Details
        Type CurrencyAmount
        Example Value 80000
        Required true
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Tax
        An individual tax.
        Details
        Type Tax
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 99
